title: Luxury Penthouse Makeover
description: A complete transformation of a 4BHK penthouse with breathtaking ocean views, featuring custom furniture and smart home integration.

title: Contemporary 2BHK Home
description: A sleek and vibrant 2BHK transformation with pastel tones and smart storage.

title: Minimalist Studio Apartment
description: A space-efficient studio with multi-functional furniture and neutral color palette, perfect for urban living.

title: Elegant Modular Kitchen
description: A gourmet kitchen with premium appliances, marble countertops, and custom cabinetry in a neutral palette with gold accents.

title: Luxurious Master Bedroom
description: A sophisticated master suite with custom headboard, walk-in closet, and en-suite bathroom with high-end fixtures.

title: Executive Home Office
description: A productive and elegant home office with custom built-in shelving, ergonomic furniture, and perfect lighting for video conferences.
